title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1.Indexing of cubic and non-cubic powder patterns.2.Estimation of precise lattice parameter of cubic crystals3.Estimation of crystal size and r.m.s. strain in mechanically alloyed nanostructured metals.4.Determination of retained austenite in quenched steel.5.Advanced stereographic projections.6.Estimation of residual stress in cold worked metals by XRD.7.TEM sample preparation, observation and SAD pattern analysis.
